description.text: The target of this unfortunate crusting instability finds their enemies' strikes landing rather more often than mundane statistics would suggest.
Open one of your six mouths and sing the song that ends the Earth.
You are incredibly sensitive to electromagnetic fields, or at least you believe yourself to be.
You've been exposed to a hideous, flesh-eating chemical! Should you stop, drop and roll? If only you'd paid attention in chemistry class.
A piece of high-velocity fruit.
A piece of high-velocity fruit.
description.monsterText: throws a piece of glowing fruit!

description.text: A piece of high-velocity fruit.
description.monsterText: throws a piece of forbidden fruit!

description.text: The Tree of Woe inflicts the boundless fury of the elements, wearing down the body.
This glowing stain renders you about as subtle as an explosion in a fireworks factory.
You have eaten of the forbidden fruit of knowledge! You are especially vulnerable to righteous retribution and religious tracts.
Defaulting on mob loans is a leading cause of broken legs.
The First International Bank of Diggle: Hating our Customers So Much for 1,800 years.
Looks like someone has a case of the Mondays!
Your insides are trying to promote themselves to outsides.

spell.name: The Long Arm of the Law

description.text: The fury of the shogun has reduced you to a weakened state.
Please to purge The Party of all imperialists and saboteurs! Though may be to weaken us in the short term, The Party will overcome and grow stronger than ever! (Really!)
Through process of self-criticism, you admit your ideological errors and re-affirm your commitment to the Party line. Yay!
Accidental exposure to Communist water fluoridation has resulted in decrease of strength of personal bodily fluids! (Still, teeth feel powerful and socialist.)
Special economic zones are to providink additional income without compromisink your commitment to glorious revolution (somehow).
EVERYTHING IS FINE IN KREMLIN.
Hard times to be testink commitment of comrade. True comrade needs only revolutionary spirit to fill stomach! Please to be recovering mana with nice Party-approved cup of hot water.
Affirmation must meet negation!
Quickly, disappear before the imperialist counterattack!
Guerrilla warfare is to be attackink imperialists quickly, then disappearink before they respond!
To counterattackink during winter is to drive back imperialists! (Could use vodka to warm comrade.)
To counterattackink during winter is to drive back imperialists! (Could use vodka to warm comrade.)
Vodka is to be fuellink winter counter-offensive. Death to imperialist scum!
Glorious Socialist Health Care of Kanadian comrades closes wounds at the steady bureaucratic pace.
Vanguard Party will lead working class in glorious workers' revolution! (Beware of possibility of negative effects resultink from use of Party Vanguard. If in doubt, purge Central Committee.)
Revolutionary Science will sweep away irrationality and superstitions of old! (Please to be removink random capitalist curse and replacink with Party-approved buff or debuff.)
'Brax, buddy, I'll have your money next week - I promise!'
It doesn't look like Diggle Juice is taking off.
Now you've got to run expenses off credit - the interest is killer!
You got burned on this one. But no one said that rogue-entrepreneuership was going to be easy!
The First International Bank of Diggle: Hating Our Customers So Much For 1000 Years.
Some of Imhotep's earlier, little-known ventures could tend toward the shady.
Your credit is still good, right? Take out a quick loan. (This is not a good idea if you're currently involved in any shady business practices.)
Scales payback based on hitpoints.

Some investments are simply no good - make them someone elses' responsibility! Moves the consequences of your poor financial choices onto a target monster and deals toxic damage based on your Caddishness.
Hire one of Dredmor's minions as a contractor for 50 turns. ('Bribery' is such an ugly word.)
Make an investment in your own safety; trades your hard "earned" zorkmids for damage mitigation of up to half of all damage done to you.
You're too big to fail now! Get a bailout to remove all the consequences of your fiscal irresponsibility.
The poisons of the Asp combined with the cleverness of Imhotep enhances your damage and resistance.
The sand does not belong in your eyes!
Truly, you were built to stand the test of time. (Thanks, Imhotep.)
Truly, this one has failed the test of time. Watch it crumble. (Thanks, Imhotep.)

Glyph of the Eye of Ra

description.text: Channel the fury of nature and the Ruin of Time to blast away ye mighty enemies - and despair. The Sandstorm becomes more powerful with the more Egyptian Glyphs you have active.
Mostly Eternal(ish) life comes with certain advantages ... and certain drawbacks.
You are the unconquered source of all power! (Or, at least, a serviceable analog for the modestly-disputed middleman of some power.)
It's not just a river in Egypt anymore - it's a way of life.
Channel the power of The Nile; of life and death; of growth and renewel. With each sigil, you are assisted with further effects of healing and regrowth.

description.text: The asp is a symbol of royalty. It's also really, really poisonous. Maybe it's best not to read too much into that.
Ah, Imhotep. He's so dreamy...
When you die, Anubis will weigh your heart against a feather. For best results, try to avoid foods high in cholesterol.

spell.name: Glyph of the Eye of Ra

description.text: Ra is the only deity who can afford to own two boats in this economy.
Cast on items far away to shove them in your inventory. Nothing exceeds the reach of the law!
Using powerful legalese, obtain an injunction against a monster for transformation plus damages.
OBJECTION! Removes a curse from yourself and gives it to target.
How can you cast when you have no mouth? And how can you breathe, for that matter.
The courts have seen fit to grant you a temporary resistance to magic. Use it wisely.
Manipulate objects with the powers of the mind.
You are steadfast in your denial of supernatural powers. Science must have an answer!

You have the Brain Worms! A colony of alien parasites have set up camp in your cranium, granting you increased intelligence, but causing severe headaches as they gnaw inconsiderately on your fusiform gyrus.
You have contracted a hideous disease from outer space, resulting in a bout of crippling weakness but boosting your latent mental abilities! Also your pee glows now.
Strange alien nanoparticles course through your bloodstream, temporarily granting you preternatural speed and strength.
Thinking is a dangerous pastime. Try to avoid it wherever possible.

description.text: You have been granted a great boon for striking down enemies in the name of your god, Ra. Jaffa kree!
So much to do, and so much to see!
Curse that strange, foreign food!
I will never eat again.
The Diggle Devil thanks you for your patronage and looks forward to collecting his payment... later.
Suffer your enemies the fiery wrath of Diggle Hell! (It's a real place. Really.)
The joys of photography can be yours!
